subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kimi Raikkonen and Felipe Massa gave Ferrari a sweep of the top two places at the French Grand Prix yesterday in Magny-Cours, ending McLaren’s winning streak at three Formula One races.Raikkonen, who also captured the season-opening Australian Grand Prix, won his second race this year — and the 11th of his career — after starting third on the grid. He finished the 2.74-mile circuit in 1 hour 30 minutes 54.200 seconds. Massa was nearly 2.5 seconds behind.The rookie Lewis Hamilton was third, 32 seconds behind Raikkonen.
